attributes.action: Give all pregnant women in scotland a 20 week scan as standard.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
At the moment in scotland we only get ONE scan this occures at approximately 12-14 weeks. I am hoping for another scan to be introduce at 20 weeks as is happeneing in england. 
So many conditions and abnormalities can be detected at a 20 week scan and therefor the parents have a choice if they would like to continue or not.
I am setting up this petition as i myself had a 20 week scan and problems were discovered with my baby. If i hadn't have had this scan i would have continued to have a home birth, where my son would have died. I already have 2 healthy boys so i did not expect there to be any problems in this pregnancy, but there were. 
I would appreciate as many signatures as possible so maybe something will be done about this situation.
Thank you for your support.
Vicki Miller
